title: Boosted photoconversion of SF6 over defective ZnGa2O4 nanosheets under mild conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00324A, Communication
Shan Zhu, Yue Zhao, Fengxiang Ma, Yue Yin, Weijia Shi, Feng Zhu, Wenya Fan, Peijin Du, Jinyu Ding
SF6 photoconversion was realized using perfect and defective spinel nanosheets under mild conditions. The results demonstrate that oxygen defects aid in expanding the capabilities of photoabsorption and facilitating carrier separation.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
